data.text: @stevenmarkryan I'd been following Tesla for a while, but not actively. It wasn't something I had an eye on until I started considering an EV. After ordering my M3 in 2019, I saw the insane demand but analysts saying the company was going bust, it didn't add up, so I invested.

- 1 car with no brake pads
-roof that flew open had third party customization - debunked-Not Tesla’s fault.
-Mismatch brand of tires on Plaid. One case. Right tire sizes. No safety issue. Supply chain. 
-very few incidents of bumpers falling
